Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: As a CLI user (Relying Party) I should be able to create and name a JSON proof definition (locally)
Issue.description: I should be able to: # Create, name and save a JSON proof definition so I (as a Prover and Owner) can request and offer proofs from the CLI.# The definition can be stored locally (no need to write it to the ledger)h2. PoA|https://docs.google.com/document/d/10Td0kMl6wOv53OcqcLqhaK_sp_q7k21lJVex7T1l8NQ/edit
